name: Batteries Plus
materials: Compact Fluorescent Lights; Batteries (Rechargeable); Alkaline/Single-Use Batteries; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Cameras; DVD Players/Blu-Ray Players/DVRs; Electronics; GPS Units; Laptop Computers; MP3 Players; Computer Peripherals; Portable Media Players; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; Video Game Systems; Blu-Ray Players; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
Some fees for battery recycling may apply. Please contact your Local store for details.

Batteries Plus lead by example by recycling the majority of the batteries we sell. Not only do we recycle to protect our environment, we support retail and business customers alike by keeping them in full compliance with federal, state, municipal, EPA and DOT regulations governing the disposal and recycling of spent batteries and select electronics.
